ygData.subject: Spam!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Did anyone else get the following directmail garbage attached to their daily digest from onelist, for this group?  This person, in the height of stupidity,
ygData.messageBody:
Did anyone else get the following directmail garbage attached to their daily
digest from onelist, for this group? This person, in the height of
stupidity, attached the entire digest, from which she assembled the email
addresses to send us direct mail (that's how I know it came from being on
this list). Of course, I deleted the digest from this post so as not to
take up space. This is a violation of the "no spam" agreement with onelist.
I ask the moderator to please boot this individual and inform onelist of
this so they can take action against them; either by booting them from all
lists (if they are a legitimate user who just decided to be an ass one day)
or by filing a tort, if they are a business that is damaging them monetarily
by doing stuff like this.



-----Original Message-----
From: lisahendricks@... [mailto:lisahendricks@...]

Sent: Thursday, September 09, 1999 1:44 PM
To: lisahendricks@...
Subject: Want To be in Business?



We are The Relationship Shopper, a 24-hour computerized
dating service that puts the word business into the term
"Home Based Business".

The Relationship Shopper is not a get rich quick scheme or
an MLM, but a business that offers a terrific income potential
through steady growth with only minimal participation.

Territories are protected by a license agreement that allows
only one license per city or area and are issued on first come
first serve basis.

Financing is available for qualified individuals.

For complete details visit http://www.rshopper.com


To be taken off our databse simply fax in your email
address and or domain to 1-810-279-1624
